SELECT cii.ID, cii.STAFF_ID, cii.ACCOUNT_ADDRESS, cii.ACCOUNT_POSTAL_CODE, cii.CURRENT_ADDRESS, cii.CURRENT_POSTAL_CODE, cii.BANK_CARD_NUMBER, cii.SOCIAL_SECURITY_HOSPITAL, cii.NEW_TRANSFER, cii.PENSION_INSURANCE_BASE, cii.WORK_INJURY_INSURANCE_BASE, cii.MEDICAL_INSURANCE_BASE, cii.CREATE_TIME, cii.MODIFY_TIME, cso.SORT_NUM_2 AS sortNum, cso.`NAME`, cso.ID_NUM, cso.GENDER, cso.CLAN, cso.HOUSEHOLD_REGISTRATION_TYPE, cso.TRANSFER_DATE, cso.PHONE_CELL, cso.IS_LEAVE FROM cy_insurance_outside AS cii LEFT JOIN cy_staff_outside AS cso ON(cso.STAFF_ID=cii.STAFF_ID) WHERE FIND_IN_SET(cso.IS_LEAVE, #{insuranceOutside.isLeave})
AND cso.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{insuranceOutside.name},'%')
AND cso.GENDER = #{insuranceOutside.gender}
AND FIND_IN_SET(cso.HOUSEHOLD_REGISTRATION_TYPE, #{insuranceOutside.householdRegistrationType})
AND cso.ID_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{insuranceOutside.idNum},'%')
AND cii.BANK_CARD_NUMBER LIKE CONCAT('%',#{insuranceOutside.bankCardNumber},'%')
AND cii.SOCIAL_SECURITY_HOSPITAL LIKE CONCAT('%',#{insuranceOutside.socialSecurityHospital},'%')
AND cii.NEW_TRANSFER = #{insuranceOutside.newTransfer}
ORDER BY SORT_NUM_1 ASC, SORT_NUM_2 ASC

SELECT cii.ID, cii.STAFF_ID, cso.SORT_NUM_2 AS sortNum, cso.`NAME`, cso.ID_NUM, cso.HOUSEHOLD_REGISTRATION_TYPE, cii.PENSION_INSURANCE_BASE, cii.WORK_INJURY_INSURANCE_BASE, cii.MEDICAL_INSURANCE_BASE FROM cy_insurance_outside AS cii LEFT JOIN cy_staff_outside AS cso ON(cso.STAFF_ID=cii.STAFF_ID) WHERE FIND_IN_SET(cso.IS_LEAVE, #{insuranceOutside.isLeave})
AND cso.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{insuranceOutside.name},'%')
AND cso.ID_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{insuranceOutside.idNum},'%')
ORDER BY SORT_NUM_1 ASC, SORT_NUM_2 ASC

SELECT cii.ID, cii.STAFF_ID, cii.ACCOUNT_ADDRESS, cii.ACCOUNT_POSTAL_CODE, cii.CURRENT_ADDRESS, cii.CURRENT_POSTAL_CODE, cii.BANK_CARD_NUMBER, cii.SOCIAL_SECURITY_HOSPITAL, cii.NEW_TRANSFER, cii.PENSION_INSURANCE_BASE, cii.WORK_INJURY_INSURANCE_BASE, cii.MEDICAL_INSURANCE_BASE, cii.CREATE_TIME, cii.MODIFY_TIME, cso.SORT_NUM_2 AS sortNum, cso.`NAME`, cso.GENDER, cso.CLAN, cso.HOUSEHOLD_REGISTRATION_TYPE, cso.TRANSFER_DATE, cso.PHONE_CELL FROM cy_insurance_outside AS cii LEFT JOIN cy_staff_outside AS cso ON(cso.STAFF_ID=cii.STAFF_ID) WHERE cso.ID_NUM=#{idNum} LIMIT 1
